entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:41 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 02:45 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 01:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 01:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 01:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
